document.docAuthor: Belokobylskij, Sergey A. & Achterberg, Cornelis Van
document.masterDocTitle: Review of the braconid parasitoid subfamily Doryctinae (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) from the United Arab Emirates and Yemen

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the braconid parasitoid subfamily Doryctinae (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) from the United Arab Emirates and Yemen

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Zoological Institute, Russian Academy of Sciences, St. Petersburg 199034, Russia. & Museum and Institute of Zoology, Polish Academy of Sciences, Wilcza 64, Warszawa 00 - 679, Poland.

bibRefCitation.author: Tobias V. I.
bibRefCitation.refString: Tobias V. I. 1962. Two new species of braconids (Hymenoptera) from Central Asia and their relationship with the African fauna. Proceedings of Zoological Institute of the USSR Academy of Sciences 30: 271 - 277. [In Russian.]

figureCitation.captionText-0: Fig. 30. Hecabalodes radialis Tobias, 1962, paratype, ♀ (ZISP). A. Habitus, lateral view. B. Head, front view. C. Head and mesoscutum, dorsal view. D. Head and mesosoma, lateral view. E. Mesosoma, dorsal view. F. Propodeum and first to third metasomal tergites, dorsal view.
figureCitation.captionText-1: Fig. 31. Hecabalodes radialis Tobias, 1962, paratype, ♀ (ZISP). A. Fore wings. B. Hind wing. C. Metasoma, dorsal view. D. Metasoma, lateral view.

caption.paragraph:
Fig. 30.
Hecabalodes radialis Tobias, 1962
, paratype, ♀ (ZISP). A . Habitus, lateral view. B . Head, front view. C . Head and mesoscutum, dorsal view. D . Head and mesosoma, lateral view. E . Mesosoma, dorsal view. F . Propodeum and first to third metasomal tergites, dorsal view.

Fig. 31.
Hecabalodes radialis Tobias, 1962
, paratype, ♀ (ZISP). A . Fore wings. B . Hind wing. C . Metasoma, dorsal view. D . Metasoma, lateral view.
